summary.para: Called when the Content Decryption Module (CDM) has generated a message for the session.

param.name: messageType
param.para: A value from the enumeration specifying the type of the message.

param.name: message
param.para: A pointer to a BYTE array containing the message contents. Messages are Key System-specific.

param.name: messageSize
param.para: The size of the array in the message parameter.

param.name: destinationURL
param.para: A optional parameter containing the destination URL.

remarks.para: KeyMessage is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeyMessageEvent.

summary.para: Called when there has been a change in the keys in the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session or their status.

remarks.para: Get the current status of the CDM session keys by calling .
KeyStatusChanged is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's keystatuseschange.

summary.para: Provides a callback mechanism for receiving key status change updates from an .

remarks.para: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSessionCallbacks is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's keystatuseschange event.
